title: Bug 20249 [Help] Change editor/view/perspective F1 help
description: When trying to access F1 help in the change editor menu, the help window closes immediately, preventing the user from reading its contents.
OB: When the change editor menu is open, pressing F1 should display relevant help. However, the help window closes immediately, preventing the user from reading its contents.
EB: When the change editor menu is open, pressing F1 should display relevant help, and the help window should stay open for the user to read.
SR:
1. Open the change editor menu.
2. Press the F1 key.
